summary: "Othello and Desdemona in Venice" is a painting by Théodore Chassériau, inspired by William Shakespeare's play "Othello." Written around 1603, the tragedy tells the story of Othello, a military leader, who is tricked by his friend Iago into thinking his wife Desdemona is unfaithful. The play is set in Venice and Cyprus. It's one of Shakespeare's most famous works, often compared to other great tragedies like "Macbeth" and "Hamlet." The play has been performed many times and adapted for stage, screen, and even opera.
title: Othello
